CustomField.description: Returns ACV only for deals that closed won in Q1 2026 (Feb 1 - Apr 30). Use this column to see closed revenue without double-counting open pipeline.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Stage 6. Closed(Won)"), CloseDate >= DATE(2026, 2, 1), CloseDate <= DATE(2026, 4, 30) ), ACV__c, 0 )
CustomField.label: Q1 2026 Closed Won ACV
